overview.en: Utilizing the unique decentralized trust mechanism of blockchain technology to establish a KPC-centric payment system, so that consumers can use KPC to conduct consumption circulation and buy and sell real products of the same value.
overview.zh: 利用区块链技术独特的去中心化信任机制建立以KPC为中心支付的代币系统，从而让消费者可以利用KPC来进行消费流通以及买卖同等价值的真实的商品。
